title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Putting AI at the core of transformation (AIM427)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 将人工智能置于转型核心 (AIM427)
abstract: As enterprises progress on their digital transformation journeys, the next step is to pivot towards an AI-centered approach. This session will explore strategies and best practices for integrating AI responsibly into existing transformation initiatives, ensuring that AI becomes a core component of business processes and decision-making. This presentation is brought to you by Infosys, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 随着企业在数字化转型之旅中不断前进，下一步是转向以人工智能为中心的方法。本次会议将探讨将人工智能负责任地集成到现有转型计划中的策略和最佳实践，确保人工智能成为业务流程和决策制定的核心组成部分。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Infosys 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Keisha Garcia
presenter.title: VP Digital Enterprise Platforms and Systems of Work

presenter.name: Krishna Srinivasan
presenter.title: Director - Enterprise Architecture, Cloud and DevOps

presenter.name: Srinivas Upadhyaya
presenter.title: Head of Business Services & Digital Technologies
